_description: Gospel for Friday of the Second Week in Advent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Iohn Baptist als gastly lecheWas in desert þe folk to preche…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And serue god euer in pouertAls did saint iohan so in desert
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “FUit Iohannes in deserto predicans” (f. 5ra).
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feriorum vi secunde ebdomade aduentus domini Euangelium secundum Marcum (rubric, f. 5ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.167-168.
